importance.external.permutation

Class Average

  • java.lang.Object
    • importance.external.permutation.PermImportance<double[],java.lang.Double>
      • importance.external.permutation.Average
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExternalImportanceIF<double[]>, ImportanceIF<double[]>

    public class Average
extends PermImportance<double[],java.lang.Double>
    Given a scalar statistic, computes the average statistic for each variable over all trees

        public double[] getImportances()

      • addStatOfVar

        protected void addStatOfVar(int v,
                java.lang.Double index,
                int treeId)
        Description copied from class: PermImportance
        Adds the statistic of variable v computed on one tree. This should be called for each variable on each tree.
        Specified by:
        addStatOfVar in class PermImportance<double[],java.lang.Double>
        Parameters:
        v - is the column index of the variable in the full dataset
        index - is the value of the statistic computed on one tree with and without permuting variable v
        treeId - is the id of the current tree
